title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Closest Friends Become His Foes in Courtroom Clash
description: The FTX founder’s criminal trial has made clear just how much his inner circle has turned against him.

title: As Red States Curb Social Media, Did Montana’s TikTok Ban Go Too Far?
description: Montana is at the forefront of a wave of new tech laws passed by Republican-led states. Some give parents control over their children’s social media accounts.

title: ‘A.I. Obama’ and Fake Newscasters: How A.I. Audio Is Swarming TikTok
description: TikTok accounts are spreading falsehoods with the help from A.I.-generated voices.

title: Energy Firms, Green Groups and Others Reach Deal on Solar Farms
description: The agreement could help speed up the development of large solar projects that are often bogged down by fights over land use and environmental concerns.
